info.name: Gate Proxy
info.description: A lightweight and fast proxy for Minecraft, written in Go.

install.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y wget curl git
wget -O /tmp/install.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XfeaturesGroup/PterodactylEggs/main/nests/minecraft/gate-proxy/install.sh || curl -o /tmp/install.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/XfeaturesGroup/PterodactylEggs/main/nests/minecraft/gate-proxy/install.sh
bash /tmp/install.sh

variables.name: Gate Proxy Version (Latest/Specific Tag)
variables.description: Version of Gate Proxy to download (e.g., 'latest' or 'v0.1.0').

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The port Gate will listen on for incoming connections.

variables.name: Default Backend Address
variables.description: IP:port of the default Minecraft backend server (e.g., 172.18.0.2:25565).
